name: Feather Gladiator
description:
FEATHER GLADIATOR

Made for Ludum Dare #37 "One Room"

What a predicament! You find yourself in the arena, surrounded by legions of the undead with a feather duster as your only weapon! Kill the spawners (graves and coffins) and survive the waves of enemies!

If you make it through enough waves, you may even encounter a merchant with a suspicious grin who will sell you help.

CONTROLS:
move: arrow keys
jump: z
attack: x
shield: down arrow

buy from cart: 1,2,3 keys

UPDATE: Post-Compo version removed. Too much twine and duct tape.
